Superior Invisibility.description: The dragon casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterInv]{Greater Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Greater Invisibility.name: Greater Invisibility
Greater Invisibility.description: A creature you touch has the Invisible condition until the spell ends.

Dancing Lights.name: Dancing Lights
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell’s range.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Hallucinatory Terrain.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
Hallucinatory Terrain.description:
You make natural terrain in a 150-foot Cube in range look, sound, and smell like another sort of natural terrain. Thus, open fields or a road can be made to resemble a swamp, hill, crevasse, or some other difficult or impassable terrain. A pond can be made to seem like a grassy meadow, a precipice like a gentle slope, or a rock-strewn gully like a wide and smooth road. Manufactured structures, equipment, and creatures within the area aren’t changed.

The tactile characteristics of the terrain are unchanged, so creatures entering the area are likely to notice the illusion. If the difference isn’t obvious by touch, a creature examining the illusion can take the Study action to make an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC to disbelieve it. If a creature discerns that the terrain is illusory, the creature sees a vague image superimposed on the real terrain.

Polymorph.name: Polymorph
Polymorph.description:
You attempt to transform a creature that you can see within range into a Beast. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or shape-shift into a Beast form for the duration. That form can be any Beast you choose that has a Challenge Rating equal to or less than the target’s (or the target’s level if it doesn’t have a Challenge Rating). The target’s game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen Beast, but the target retains its alignment, personality, creature type, Hit Points, and Hit Point Dice. See appendix B for a sample of Beast stat blocks.

The target gains a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to the Hit Points of the Beast form. The spell ends early on the target if it has no Temporary Hit Points left.

The target is limited in the actions it can perform by the anatomy of its new form, and it can’t speak or cast spells.

The target’s gear melds into the new form. The creature can’t use or otherwise benefit from any of that equipment.

Faerie Dragon Youth.name: Faerie Dragon Youth
Faerie Dragon Youth.description:
Faerie Dragons

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.AqBgo4Po2QO1WBkC caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Faerie Dragon Youth

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Euphoria Breath.name: Euphoria Breath
Euphoria Breath.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns and uses all its movement on its turn to move in a random direction.

Incapacitated.name: Incapacitated
Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDancingLig]{Dancing Lights}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}

Superior Invisibility.name: Superior Invisibility
Superior Invisibility.description: The dragon casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterInv]{Greater Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Greater Invisibility.name: Greater Invisibility
Greater Invisibility.description: A creature you touch has the Invisible condition until the spell ends.

Dancing Lights.name: Dancing Lights
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell’s range.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Ffolk Sailing Ship.name: Ffolk Sailing Ship
Ffolk Sailing Ship.description:
Ffolk craft durable sailing vessels that can handle even the roughest waters in the Moonshae Isles.

Cost: 20,000 GP

More Details on the Ship: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifNavigatingThe.JournalEntryPage.RFew8B4J57DIYp7j]{Moonshae Vehicles Table}

Fiend Cultist.description:

Cultists

Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmPactAxe0000000]] attacks.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], +7 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScorchingR]{Scorching Ray} (level 5 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

2/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 6 version)

Hellish Rebuke.name: Hellish Rebuke
Hellish Rebuke.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHellishReb]{Hellish Rebuke} in response to that spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

JKj2mFhjY5PxpL16.name: Hellish Rebuke JKj2mFhjY5PxpL16
JKj2mFhjY5PxpL16.description:
The creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by green flames. It makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d10 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 1.

activation.condition: taking damage from a creature that you can see within 60 feet of yourself

Scorching Ray.name: Scorching Ray
Scorching Ray.description:
You hurl three fiery rays. You can hurl them at one target within range or at several. Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 Fire damage.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You create one additional ray for each spell slot level above 2.

[[@item.level + 1]]{Total Rays}

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
明亮的闪光从你的指间飞驰向施法距离内你指定的一点，并随着一声低吼迸成一片烈焰。目标点周围半径 20 尺球状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者将受到 8d6 点火焰伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

区域内所有未被着装或携带的可燃物件会开始燃烧。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，其伤害就增加 1d6。

materials.value: a ball of bat guano and sulfur

Fire Aura.name: Fire Aura
Fire Aura.description: At the end of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=15VgJKVXwYBOFSqJ]] of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=15VgJKVXwYBOFSqJ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage. Creatures and flammable objects in the Emanation start burning.

Fire Form.name: Fire Form
Fire Form.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so, and it can enter a creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet.

Water Susceptibility.name: Water Susceptibility
Water Susceptibility.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 3 (1d6) Cold damage damage for every 5 feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves in water or for every gallon of water splashed on it.

Foundry Note

Scaling is configured to roll the correct number of dice based on the distance traveled through water. 1 is default for 5 feet, 2 is for 10 feet, and so forth.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmBurn0000000000]] attacks.

Burn.name: Burn
Burn.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it starts &Reference[burning].

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .mmFlameSword0000]] or [[/item .mmHammerThrow000]]in any combination.

Hammer Throw.name: Hammer Throw
Hammer Throw.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is pushed up to 15 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

attack.chatFlavor: On Hit: Target pushed 15 feet away.

Disadv.: Attacks.name: Disadv.: Attacks
Disadv.: Attacks.description: The target has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Undead Restoration.name: Undead Restoration
Undead Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed, it regains all its Hit Points in 1 hour unless @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagHolyWater00]{Holy Water} is sprinkled on its remains or the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good} spell is cast on them.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .Wmqg7e8xqYtT848N]] attacks.

Spellcasting.description:

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.description:
You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart strikes a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 Force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell creates one more dart for each spell slot level above 1.

[[2 + @item.level]]{Level [[lookup @item.level]] darts}

Fireball.name: Fireball

明亮的闪光从你的指间飞驰向施法距离内你指定的一点，并随着一声低吼迸成一片烈焰。目标点周围半径 20 尺球状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者将受到 8d6 点火焰伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet.

Death Burst.name: Death Burst
Death Burst.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .jmtfmb8isTfURSSq]] or [[/item .zhyJH2fjFrdV5nRI]] in any combination.

Aversion to Fire.name: Aversion to Fire
Aversion to Fire.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Averse.name: Averse
Averse.description: It has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description:
Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts its turn &Reference[Bloodied], roll [[/r 1d6]]. On a 6, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks an object. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s creator, if within [[lookup @range.value activity=tnkOsrSwEElO2kZM]] feet of the berserk [[lookup @name lowercase]], can try to calm it by taking an action to make a [[/check ability=cha skill=per dc=@abilities.str.dc]] DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check; the golem must be able to hear its creator. If this check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk until the start of its next turn, at which point it resumes rolling for the Berserk trait again if it is still Bloodied.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: On each of its turns while berserk, the creature attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the creature attacks an object. Once the creature goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer &Reference[Bloodied apply=false].

Lightning Absorption.name: Lightning Absorption
Lightning Absorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Lightning damage dealt.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Slam]] attacks.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't provoke an &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]{Opportunity Attack} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Flying Wonder.name: Flying Wonder
Flying Wonder.description: An activated flying wonder uses the Flying Wonder stat block. The wonder is an ally to you and your allies. In combat, the wonder shares your Initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It obeys your verbal commands (no action required by you). If you don’t issue any, it takes the Dodge action and uses its movement to avoid danger. The flying wonder is destroyed if it drops to 0 Hit Points.

Chime.name: Chime
Chime.description: The wonder chirps a merry, metronomic tune. The wonder chooses one ally that it can see within 60 feet. Until the start of the wonder’s next turn, the target has Advantage on the next ability check it makes with a Musical Instrument or Tinker’s Tools.

Increased Carrying Capacity.name: Increased Carrying Capacity
Increased Carrying Capacity.description: The wonder can carry up to 100 pounds.

Wind-Up Operation.name: Wind-Up Operation
Wind-Up Operation.description:
The wonder has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition until another creature winds it with the wonder’s unique key for 1 minute. Once wound, the wonder operates for 24 hours or until a creature touches the wonder with its key as a Utilize action to deactivate it, after which the wonder has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition until it is wound again.

Foundry Note

The wonder begins in the Unconscious state. To place the wonder in its Wound Up state, disable the Active Effect (AE) located on the Effects Tab of the character sheet.

Unconscious.name: Unconscious
Unconscious.description: The wonder is &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} until it is wound again.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .Eba7VT2YBJ5cHYyK]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmWarpingHex0000]] if available.

Warping Hex.name: Warping Hex
Warping Hex.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=KaTc2c6hOHAqtywC]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=KaTc2c6hOHAqtywC]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=KaTc2c6hOHAqtywC]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level.

Success: Half damage only.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect that will modify the target.  Since the Exhaustion condition can be applied multiple times, the Active Effect must be dragged from this item’s Effects tab onto the target item’s sheet after the initial application of the Exhaustion condition.

Exhaustion.name: Exhaustion
Exhaustion.description: The target of the attack from the attacking creature gains one &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .mmFrostAxe000000]] or [[/item .mmGreatBow000000]] in any combination.

Great Bow.name: Great Bow
Great Bow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target's Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

Speed: -10 Ft..name: Speed: -10 Ft.
Speed: -10 Ft..description: The target’s Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

War Cry.name: War Cry

Each boulder uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.aifGalebDuhr0000] stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1 and lacks this action. The boulder takes its turn immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] on the same Initiative count, and it obeys the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. A boulder remains animate for [[lookup @duration.value activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] minute or until it or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

affects.special: one or two boulders it can see

Death Burst.name: Death Burst
Death Burst.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]].

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target takes [[/damage average]] damage and has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for [[/r 1d12#Hours]] hours. Unless the Poisoned condition is removed, the target dies at the end of that time and sprouts [[/r 2d4#Tiny Gas Spore Fungi]] Tiny Gas Spore Fungi (each with 1 Hit Point). After [[/r 2d6#Days]] days, they become Large and have 13 Hit Points.

Spores: Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for [[/r 1d12#Hours]] hours.

Ooze Cube.name: Ooze Cube
Ooze Cube.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] fills its entire space and is transparent. Other creatures can enter that space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Engulf and has Disadvantage on the saving throw.

Creatures inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have &Reference[Total Cover], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold one Large creature or up to four Medium or Small creatures inside itself at a time.

As an action, a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]]. of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature or an object out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by succeeding on a [[/check dc=12 ability=str skill=ath format=long]], and the puller takes [[/damage average activity=PMCvyqxfUYiPzNK8]] damage.

Total Cover.name: Total Cover
Total Cover.description: Creatures inside the attacking creature have Total Cover.

Transparent.name: Transparent
Transparent.description: Even when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is in plain sight, a creature must succeed on a [[/check dc=15 ability=wis skill=prc format=long]] to notice the [[lookup @name lowercase]] if the creature hasn’t witnessed the [[lookup @name lowercase]] move or otherwise act.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures if it has room inside itself to contain them (see the @UUID[.mmOozeCube000000] trait).

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5o0Bh8PQaojx5XMx]], each creature whose space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters for the first time during this move.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is engulfed. An engulfed target is &Reference[suffocating], can’t cast spells with a Verbal component, has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the engulfed target moves with it. An engulfed target can try to escape by taking an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@abilities.str.dc]] check. On a successful check, the target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space.

Success: Half damage, and the target moves to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s. If there is no unoccupied space, the target fails the save instead.

Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained.name: Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained
Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained.description: An engulfed target is &Reference[suffocating], can’t cast spells with a Verbal component, has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, and takes [[/damage average 3d6 type=acid]] damage at the start of each of the user's turns.

Stench.description:

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to the Stench of all [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithD]{Speak with Dead}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

Speak with Dead.name: Speak with Dead
Speak with Dead.description:
你给施法距离内一具尸体表面的生命力，让其可回答你的问题。这具尸体必须还有一张嘴，且如果该生物死亡时是不死生物，施法失败。若目标尸体在最近十日内曾被作为该法术的目标，则本次施法失败。

在法术终止前，你可以向尸体提出最多五个问题。尸体的知识和它讲述的语言仅限于其生前所知。回答通常是简短，含糊或重复的语句，而且如果你对尸体抱有敌意或者尸体认为你是其敌人，它也不是一定要给你正确的答复。该法术并不能让该生物的灵魂返回其身体中，只是活化了其精神。因此，该尸体不能认知新的信息，不能理解它死后发生的任何事情，也不能对未来的事件作出猜测。

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]], any creature (other than a [[lookup @name lowercase]]) that starts its turn in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to the Stench of all [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Ethereal Sight.name: Ethereal Sight
Ethereal Sight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. It takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .yf1Nf7oPWS4arOOL]] attacks.

Etherealness.name: Etherealness
Etherealness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness} spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is visible on the Material Plane while on the Border Ethereal and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

88qd0Ulz7AMzouDU.name: Etherealness 88qd0Ulz7AMzouDU
88qd0Ulz7AMzouDU.description:
You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, where it overlaps with your current plane. You remain in the Border Ethereal for the duration. During this time, you can move in any direction. If you move up or down, every foot of movement costs an extra foot. You can perceive the plane you left, which looks gray, and you can't see anything there more than 60 feet away.

While on the Ethereal Plane, you can affect and be affected only by creatures, objects, and effects on that plane. Creatures that aren't on the Ethereal Plane can't perceive or interact with you unless a feature gives them the ability to do so.

When the spell ends, you return to the plane you left in the spot that corresponds to your space in the Border Ethereal. If you appear in an occupied space, you are shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and take Force damage equal to twice the number of feet you are moved.

This spell ends instantly if you cast it while you are on the Ethereal Plane or a plane that doesn't border it, such as one of the Outer Planes.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.You can target up to three willing creatures (including yourself) for each spell slot level above 7. The creatures must be within 10 feet of you when you cast the spell.

Horrific Visage.name: Horrific Visage
Horrific Visage.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v8KiqUloIE5eocSu]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=v8KiqUloIE5eocSu]]-foot Cone that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and isn't an Undead.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Possession.name: Possession
Possession.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=7gmNBVjwuYTyANMe]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=7gmNBVjwuYTyANMe]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=7gmNBVjwuYTyANMe]] feet.

Failure: The target is possessed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]; the [[lookup @name lowercase]] disappears, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and loses control of its body. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] now controls the body, but the target retains awareness. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that specifically target Undead. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s game statistics are the same, except it uses the possessed target's Speed, as well as the target's Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution modifiers.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 Hit Points or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] leaves as a Bonus Action. When the possession ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target, and the target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Possession for 24 hours.

Incapacitated.name: Incapacitated
Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and loses control of its body.

Standing Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Long Jump is up to 20 feet and its High Jump is up to 10 feet with or without a running start.

Grappled.name: Grappled

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] swallows a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=IPD9mDjKJEXc2uMQ]] target it is grappling. While swallowed, the target isn’t Grappled but has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, and it has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the frog.

While swallowing the target, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use Bite, and if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, the swallowed target is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting with the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

At the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn, the swallowed target takes [[/damage 2d4 acid average]] damage. If that damage doesn’t kill it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] disgorges it, causing it to exit &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.name: Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover
Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.description: While swallowed, a creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has &Reference[Total Cover apply=false] against attacks.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If you are regurgitated, you fall into a space within 10 ft. and are &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=z58sUDUmqxECJgT3]] creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra [[/damage 2d4 bludgeoning average]] damage and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectEvil]{Detect Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplClairvoyan]{Clairvoyance}

Detect Evil and Good.name: Detect Evil and Good
Detect Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, you sense the location of any Aberration, Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead within 30 feet of yourself. You also sense whether the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell is active there and, if so, where.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Clairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
Clairvoyance.description:
You create an Invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you (a place you have visited or seen before) or in an obvious location that is unfamiliar to you (such as behind a door, around a corner, or in a grove of trees). The intangible, invulnerable sensor remains in place for the duration.

When you cast the spell, choose seeing or hearing. You can use the chosen sense through the sensor as if you were in its space. As a Bonus Action, you can switch between seeing and hearing.

A creature that sees the sensor (such as a creature benefiting from See Invisibility or &Reference[truesight]) sees a luminous orb about the size of your fist.

materials.value: a focus worth 100+ GP, either a jeweled horn for hearing or a glass eye for seeing

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

Water Breathing.name: Water Breathing
Water Breathing.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe only underwater. It can hold its breath for {duration} outside water.

Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Walker.name: Web Walker
Web Walker.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] swallows a Medium or smaller target it is grappling.

While swallowed, the target isn’t Grappled but has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, and it has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

In addition, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage at the end of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one target swallowed at a time, and it can’t use Bite while it has a swallowed target.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting with the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.name: Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover
Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.description: While swallowed, a creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has &Reference[Total Cover apply=false] against attacks.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If you are regurgitated, you fall into a space within 10 ft. and are &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Aberrant Ground.name: Aberrant Ground
Aberrant Ground.description: The ground in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zVznqPXgYjETqpQz]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name]] is &Reference[Difficult Terrain].

Gibbering.name: Gibbering
Gibbering.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] babbles incoherently while it doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=PyGOI84k0PPYrru8]], any [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=PyGOI84k0PPYrru8]] that starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=PyGOI84k0PPYrru8]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while it is babbling.

Failure: The target rolls [[/r 1d8]] to determine what it does during the current turn:

1–4. The target does nothing.

5–6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction.

7–8. The target makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can’t make such an attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. The target dies if it is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack. Its body is then absorbed into the [[lookup @name]], leaving only equipment behind.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

Blinding Spittle.name: Blinding Spittle
Blinding Spittle.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within [[lookup @range.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Blinded.name: Blinded
Blinded.description: the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the user’s next turn.

Githyanki Knight.name: Githyanki Knight
Githyanki Knight.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmPlateArmor]{Plate Armor}

Githyanki

Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item Silver Sword]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis} if available.

Silver Sword.name: Silver Sword
Silver Sword.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Critical Hit: If the target is in an astral body (as with the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAstralProj]{Astral Projection} spell), the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body instead of dealing damage.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand} (the hand is Invisible)

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplNondetecti]{Nondetection} (self only), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTongues000]{Tongues}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis}

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Nondetection.name: Nondetection
Nondetection.description: For the duration, you hide a target that you touch from Divination spells. The target can be a willing creature, or it can be a place or an object no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. The target can’t be targeted by any Divination spell or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

materials.value: a pinch of diamond dust worth 25+ GP, which the spell consumes

Tongues.name: Tongues
Tongues.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken or signed language that it hears or sees. Moreover, when the target communicates by speaking or signing, any creature that knows at least one language can understand it if that creature can hear the speech or see the signing.

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

materials.value: a forked, metal rod worth 250+ GP and attuned to a plane of existence

affects.special: you and up to eight willing creatures

Telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
Telekinesis.description:
你获得以思想移动或操纵生物或物件的能力。你施展法术时或在法术终止前的其后回合中用一个魔法动作，你可以向施法距离内可见的一名生物或一个物件伸展你的意志，造成对应的下述效应。你可以一轮接一轮地影响同一个目标，也可以在任何时候选择一个新的目标。如果你改变了目标，则之前的目标将不再受该法术影响。

生物。 你可以尝试移动一名巨型或更小的生物。目标必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以将其往任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。在你的下个回合结束前，该生物陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态，而被你举到空中的生物会在半空中悬停。除非你再次使用此选项且目标失败于豁免，否则被举到空中的生物会在你的下个回合结束坠落。

物件。 你可以尝试移动一个巨型或更小的物件。如果该物品没有被着装或携带，则你可以自动使它朝任何方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

如果该物件已被一名生物着装或携带，则那名生物必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以把目标物件从该生物身上拿走，并且使该物体朝任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

你可以使用心灵遥控对物体进行精密操作，例如操纵一件简单的工具，打开一扇门或一个容器，把东西放进或拿出一个打开的容器中，或是把一个小瓶子里的东西倒出来。

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

K191ZU4UrvUcJQ4f.name: Misty Step K191ZU4UrvUcJQ4f
K191ZU4UrvUcJQ4f.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Shield Bash.description:

Incite Rampage.name: Incite Rampage

Redirect Attack.name: Redirect Attack

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] feet of itself. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] swap places, and the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] becomes the target of the attack instead.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBlindnessD]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGrease0000]{Grease}

Jinx.name: Jinx
Jinx.description:
Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see hits it with an attack roll.

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=02KFzL9fElzyHOIT]], the triggering creature.

Failure: The attack misses instead.

Save.name: Save
Save.condition: A creature the goblin can see hits it with an attack roll.

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Blindness/Deafness.name: Blindness/Deafness
Blindness/Deafness.description:
One creature that you can see within range must succeed on a Constitution saving throw, or it has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] or &Reference[Deafened apply=false] condition (your choice) for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Blindness.name: Blindness
Blindness.description: At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=con]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Deafness.name: Deafness
Deafness.description: At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=con]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Faerie Fire.name: Faerie Fire
Faerie Fire.description:
Objects in a 20-foot Cube within range are outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Each creature in the Cube is also outlined if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can’t benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Outlined.name: Outlined
Outlined.description:
For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can’t benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Grease.name: Grease
Grease.description:
Nonflammable grease covers the ground in a 10-foot square centered on a point within range and turns it into &Reference[difficultterrain] for the duration.

When the grease appears, each creature standing in its area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[prone] condition. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on that save or fall Prone.

materials.value: a bit of pork rind or butter

Siege Monster.name: Siege Monster

Brutal Gore.name: Brutal Gore

Charge.name: Charge

Gray Ooze.name: Gray Ooze

Gray Oozes

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

Corrosive Form.name: Corrosive Form
Corrosive Form.description:
Nonmagical ammunition is destroyed immediately after hitting the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and dealing any damage. Any nonmagical weapon takes a cumulative −1 penalty to attack rolls immediately after dealing damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and coming into contact with it. The weapon is destroyed if the penalty reaches −5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the weapon.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal or wood in 1 round.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Attack Penalty active effect that will modify a targeted weapon. Since this penalty can be applied multiple times to multiple nonmagical weapons, this active effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target Item's weapons.

Damaged: -1 Attack.name: Damaged: -1 Attack
Damaged: -1 Attack.description: Any nonmagical weapon takes a cumulative −1 penalty to attack rolls immediately after dealing damage to the attacking creature and coming into contact with it.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Nonmagical armor worn by the target takes a −1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the armor.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an AC Penalty enchantment that will modify a targeted armor. Since this penalty can be applied multiple times, this enchantment needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target armor item.

Damaged: -1 AC.name: Damaged: -1 AC
Damaged: -1 AC.description: Nonmagical armor worn by the target takes a −1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the armor.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Coven Magic.name: Coven Magic
Coven Magic.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]): @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplAugury0000]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLocateObje]{Locate Object}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplUnseenServ]{Unseen Servant}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

Augury.name: Augury
Augury.description:
你从异界存在处获得一个预示，关乎你计划在未来 30 分钟内采取的一系列行动的结果。DM 从预示表中选择一个预示。

预示对应结果将是…
吉好的
凶坏的
吉凶并存既好又坏
无既不好也不坏

该法术不会考虑可能改变结果的情况，例如其他法术。

如果你在完成一次长休前多次施展此法术，则第一次施法后每次施法都有累计 25% 的几率得不到答案。

materials.value: specially marked sticks, bones, cards, or other divinatory tokens worth 25+ GP

Find Familiar.name: Find Familiar
Find Familiar.description:
You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: Bat, Cat, Frog, Hawk, Lizard, Octopus, Owl, Rat, Raven, Spider, Weasel, or another Beast that has a Challenge Rating of 0. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form (see appendix B), though it is a Celestial, Fey, or Fiend (your choice) instead of a Beast. Your familiar acts independently of you, but it obeys your commands.

Telepathic Connection. While your familiar is within 100 feet of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as a Bonus Action, you can see through the familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses it has.

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the touch. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you, and it must take a Reaction to deliver the touch when you cast the spell.

Combat. The familiar is an ally to you and your allies. It rolls its own Initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal.

Disappearance of the Familiar. When the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points, it disappears. It reappears after you cast this spell again. As a Magic action, you can temporarily dismiss the familiar to a pocket dimension. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As a Magic action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. Whenever the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points or disappears into the pocket dimension, it leaves behind in its space anything it was wearing or carrying.

One Familiar Only. You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new eligible form.

materials.value: burning incense worth 10+ GP, which the spell consumes

Identify.name: Identify
Identify.description:
You touch an object throughout the spell's casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell's name.

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

Locate Object.name: Locate Object
Locate Object.description:
Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location if that object is within 1,000 feet of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

The spell can locate a specific object known to you if you have seen it up close—within 30 feet—at least once. Alternatively, the spell can locate the nearest object of a particular kind, such as a certain kind of apparel, jewelry, furniture, tool, or weapon.

This spell can't locate an object if any thickness of lead blocks a direct path between you and the object.

Scrying.name: Scrying
Scrying.description:
You can see and hear a creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw, which is modified (see the tables below) by how well you know the target and the sort of physical connection you have to it. The target doesn't know what it is making the save against, only that it feels uneasy.

Your Knowledge of the Target Is …Save Modifier
Secondhand (heard of the target)+5
Firsthand (met the target)+0
Extensive (know the target well)−5
You Have the Target's …Save Modifier
Picture or other likeness−2
Garment or other possession−4
Body part, lock of hair, or bit of nail−10

On a successful save, the target isn't affected, and you can't use this spell on it again for 24 hours.

On a failed save, the spell creates an Invisible, intangible sensor within 10 feet of the target. You can see and hear through the sensor as if you were there. The sensor moves with the target, remaining within 10 feet of it for the duration. If something can see the sensor, it appears as a luminous orb about the size of your fist.

Instead of targeting a creature, you can target a location you have seen. When you do so, the sensor appears at that location and doesn't move.

materials.value: a focus worth 1,000+ GP, such as a crystal ball, mirror, or water-filled font

affects.special: creature on same plane of existence or a location you have seen
at target location or within 10 feet of target creature

Unseen Servant.name: Unseen Servant
Unseen Servant.description:
This spell creates an Invisible, mindless, shapeless, Medium force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends. The servant springs into existence in an unoccupied space on the ground within range. It has AC 10, 1 Hit Point, and a Strength of 2, and it can't attack. If it drops to 0 Hit Points, the spell ends.

Once on each of your turns as a Bonus Action, you can mentally command the servant to move up to 15 feet and interact with an object. The servant can perform simple tasks that a human could do, such as fetching things, cleaning, mending, folding clothes, lighting fires, serving food, and pouring drinks. Once you give the command, the servant performs the task to the best of its ability until it completes the task, then waits for your next command.

If you command the servant to perform a task that would move it more than 60 feet away from you, the spell ends.

materials.value: a bit of string and of wood

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations only with a successful [[/check format=long]].

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] attacks.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], +4 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDancingLig]{Dancing Lights}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self} (24-hour duration), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} (self only, and the hag leaves no tracks while Invisible), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRayofSickn]{Ray of Sickness} (level 3 version)

Dancing Lights.name: Dancing Lights
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell's range.

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Ray of Sickness.name: Ray of Sickness
Ray of Sickness.description:
You shoot a greenish ray at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 Poison damage and has the &Reference[poisoned] condition until the end of your next turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

Abduct.name: Abduct
Abduct.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] needn’t spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Beak]] attack and one [[/item Paralyzing Tentacles]] attack.

Paralyzing Tentacles.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
Paralyzing Tentacles.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=MEc8vUTPipCkqjyq]] [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=MEc8vUTPipCkqjyq]], it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from two of ten tentacles. The target is also subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.formula activity=MEc8vUTPipCkqjyq]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically, While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Poisoned & Paralyzed.name: Poisoned & Paralyzed
Poisoned & Paralyzed.description: The target is &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] and can repeat its save at the end of each of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Beak]] attack and one [[/item Tentacles]] attack.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from all four tentacles.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC).

Grick Ancient.name: Grick Ancient
Grick Ancient.description:
Gricks

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.ZipqOolotovtuLdW caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Grick Ancient

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.KHQHO2JXfXoBmHxq caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Beak]] attack, one [[/item Slam]] attack, and one [[/item Tentacles]] attack.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from all four tentacles.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC).

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmChainShirt]{Chain Shirt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmShield0000]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepSpear00000]{Spear}

Guards

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Zh9j3VBgGnsvq9x4 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Guard

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.IzCvcbHgZ8uPj9TU caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Guard Captain.name: Guard Captain
Guard Captain.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmBreastplat]{Breastplate}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepJavelin000]{Javelins (6)}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmShield0000]{Shield}

Guards

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Zh9j3VBgGnsvq9x4 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Guard Captain

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.vTvxvndvzT5NYBJi caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .qJUgq4viT1HD2ftt]] or [[/item .CneRFiVxRtCmo8Pl]] in any combination.

Celestial Restoration.name: Celestial Restoration
Celestial Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, it returns to life in [[/r 1d6#Days]] days and regains all its Hit Points unless @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelEvil] is cast on its remains.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Bite]] attacks. It can replace any attack with a use of [[/item Poisonous Spittle]].

Poisonous Spittle.name: Poisonous Spittle
Poisonous Spittle.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]] feet.

Failure: 31 (7d8) Poison damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Blinded.name: Blinded
Blinded.description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature ’s next turn.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Somatic or Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplClairvoyan]{Clairvoyance}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} (level 6 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFlameStrik]{Flame Strike} (level 6 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGeas000000]{Geas}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplTrueSeeing]{True Seeing}

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Clairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
Clairvoyance.description:
You create an Invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you (a place you have visited or seen before) or in an obvious location that is unfamiliar to you (such as behind a door, around a corner, or in a grove of trees). The intangible, invulnerable sensor remains in place for the duration.

When you cast the spell, choose seeing or hearing. You can use the chosen sense through the sensor as if you were in its space. As a Bonus Action, you can switch between seeing and hearing.

A creature that sees the sensor (such as a creature benefiting from See Invisibility or &Reference[truesight]) sees a luminous orb about the size of your fist.

materials.value: a focus worth 100+ GP, either a jeweled horn for hearing or a glass eye for seeing

Cure Wounds.name: Cure Wounds
Cure Wounds.description:
A creature you touch regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

Flame Strike.name: Flame Strike
Flame Strike.description:
A vertical column of brilliant fire roars down from above. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point within range makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d6 Fire damage and 5d6 Radiant damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The Fire damage and the Radiant damage increase by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 5.

Geas.name: Geas
Geas.description:
你对施法距离内你能看见的一个生物下达一条魔法口头命令，并强迫其执行相应的某种服务或克制某种行为，或者遵照你的要求行动。目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则将在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态。目标不能理解你的命令，则其在豁免中自动成功。

被魅惑生物每次做出与你的命令相悖的行为时，即受到 [[/damage 5d10 type=psychic]]伤害。该伤害一日至多生效一次。

除了涉及导致必死结果的行为外，你向目标下达的任何命令都会生效。如果你发布自杀指令则法术即时终止。

一道 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000] 可以终止该法术。

升环施法： 使用七环或八环法术位施展该法术时，持续时间变为 365 日。使用九环法术位施展该法术时，法术将一直持续至被上文提及的法术所终止。

Under Orders.name: Under Orders
Under Orders.description: While &Reference[Charmed apply=false], the creature takes [[/damage 5d10 type=psyhic]] damage if it acts in a manner directly counter to your command. It takes this damage no more than once each day.

True Seeing.name: True Seeing
True Seeing.description: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has Truesight with a range of 120 feet.

materials.value: mushroom powder worth 25+ GP, which the spell consumes

Gulthias Blight.name: Gulthias Blight
Gulthias Blight.description:
Blights

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.oIXTiU1B2cJqnVtP caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Gulthias Blight

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.yzTvB3ANn81bx7GJ caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Blight Seeds.name: Blight Seeds
Blight Seeds.description:
When it finishes a Long Rest, the blight expels [[/r 1d6#Seeds expelled]] seeds into unoccupied spaces on the ground within 30 feet of itself. After 24 hours, the seeds become creatures under the blight’s control. Roll 1d8 for each seed to determine the creature it becomes:

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmBlightSeedCrea rollable classes="aif caption-top" resultLabel="The Seed Becomes a…"]

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .mmSlam0000000000]] or [[/item .mmThornVolley000]] in any combination. It also uses [[/item .mmLifedrainingRo]].

Life-Draining Root.name: Life-Draining Root
Life-Draining Root.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] [[lookup @range.units activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of six roots. Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and takes [[/damage average activity=y8c5uBc58T7dKgQf]] damage at the start of each of its turns. The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is related to a type of dragon associated with one of the following damage types (DM's choice): Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. This choice affects other aspects of the stat block.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect to manage Damage Resistances in the character sheet's Effects tab. The resistances outlined will need to be manually enabled/disabled.

Luring Song.name: Luring Song
Luring Song.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings a magical melody, which lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Concentration ends on it.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]], each [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when the song starts.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and ignores the Luring Song of other harpies.

If the target is more than 5 feet from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target moves on its turn toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. It doesn’t avoid &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]; however, before moving into damaging terrain (such as lava or a pit) and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target repeats the save.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Luring Song for 24 hours.

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: Charmed & Incapacitated
Charmed & Incapacitated.description:
The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns.

While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Multiple Heads.name: Multiple Heads
Multiple Heads.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has five heads. Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 25 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns when it has at least one living head, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 20 Hit Points when it grows new heads.

Reactive Heads.name: Reactive Heads
Reactive Heads.description: For each head the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has beyond one, it gets an extra &Reference[Reaction] that can be used only for &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].
